imdb.plot outline: An entertainment magazine show that brings entertainment news straight to savvy seniors who want to stay in the know. The program highlights the latest Hollywood releases and interviews veteran stars of stage and screen. Broadway show launches, author interviews and other entertainment news will take viewers behind the scenes and on the red carpet.
imdb.title: Now Playing with Gary Collins
akas: Now Playing with Gary Collins (United States)
